channel.title: Python on Atharva Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Atharva Shah

item.title: Sales Data Analysis with Python
item.description: Through a combination of theoretical explanations and practical demonstrations, we will delve into data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and model building.

item.title: Digital Product Series Launch!
item.description: Boost your interview success with our exclusive digital product series! Most asked Python Interview questions (Data Structures and Algorithms) are now available on Gumroad!

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 3: Wrap-Up and Testing
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 2: Templates, Views and URLs
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 1: Functional Requirements and Setup
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Ultimate Django ORM Cheatsheet + Exercises
item.description: Master the basics of Django ORM with this comprehensive cheatsheet and exercises to level up your skills in database querying, model relationships, aggregations, annotations, and more.

item.title: Celebrating victory at CRIF Hackathon 2023
item.description: Developer experience at CRIF Hackathon 2023. We built a News Media Analysis Utility leveraging NLP, Text Processing, and Visualization with Tableau.
